title: Triumph Motorcycle transfers sales and marketing operations of India subsidiary to Bajaj Auto
description: The move follows a strategic partnership between the two companies, in which they committed to developing a new range of mid-sized Triumph Motorcycles. Effective from April 2023, all 15 of Triumph's existing dealerships in India will be managed by Bajaj Auto. Bajaj is planning to utilise its distribution network to expand Triumph's retail channels across India.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
